creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
<xsl:template match="*[local-name()='toc']" mode="body">
<node name="Table of Contents">
  <action><delete name="<xupdate:remove
select="/*/unizh:toc[@tagID='{@tagID}']"/>"/></action>
  </node>

  <xsl:call-template name="insertmenu"><xsl:with-param
name="path">/*/xhtml:body/unizh:toc</xsl:with-param></xsl:call-template>

  </xsl:template>

works,

<xsl:template match="unizh:toc" mode="body">
<node name="Table of Contents">
  <action><delete name="<xupdate:remove
select="/*/unizh:toc[@tagID='{@tagID}']"/>"/></action>
  </node>

  <xsl:call-template name="insertmenu"><xsl:with-param
name="path">/*/xhtml:body/unizh:toc</xsl:with-param></xsl:call-template>

  </xsl:template>

does not. this means that if you mix namespaces, you will likely run into problems.
